contents.text: Thank you for calling Returnly in San Francisco, the returns management platform that helps brands scale returns, improve customer experiences, and boost ROI.
For support with your existing Returnly account, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical error in my Returnly account integration
I need help fixing an API error on my Returnly integration.
I need to debug a 500 error when sending return initiation requests via the Returnly API.
I can't log into my Returnly account on my computer and need technical help.
Troubleshoot a 401 error I’m getting when authenticating the Returnly API on my test site.

contents.text: For billing and account inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Review and clarify a recent billing charge on my account
I want to clarify an unexpected billing charge on my Returnly account.
I want to verify the pro plan overage charges on my latest Returnly invoice.
I need help understanding the charges on my latest Returnly billing statement.
Get a breakdown of an unexpected charge on my account and update my payment method.

contents.text: To learn about our returns management solutions and schedule a demo, press 2.
To schedule a product demo, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for your demo.

navigationGoals: Book a product walkthrough to see Returnly’s returns management platform
I’d like to schedule a demo of Returnly for my veteran-owned online store.
I'd like to schedule a deep-dive demo of Returnly’s returns management API and dashboard.
I'd like to schedule a product demo to see how Returnly's return management works.
Schedule a product demo to see how Returnly’s returns flow customization and analytics work with my Shopify store.

contents.text: For pricing and ROI questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist for pricing details.

navigationGoals: Obtain detailed pricing and ROI estimates for Returnly’s service
I need detailed pricing info and expected ROI for a mid-level plan.
I want enterprise pricing details and an ROI projection for handling 5,000 monthly returns.
I need information on Returnly's pricing plans and what ROI I can expect.
Request detailed pricing for the mid-tier plan and an ROI estimate based on 500 returns per month.
